event: Here is the table of events and timestamps:
gross swelling of the lower right cheek
submandibular and mental regions were erythematous and warm on palpation
inflammatory changes in the mucous membrane of his oral cavity
transferred to an Intensive Care Unit
air collection in the right submandibular, in the left carotid, in the retroesophageal and pretracheal spaces
collections characterized by air and fluids in the upper, anterior, and posterior mediastinum
cervical necrotizing fasciitis with DNM derived
abscesses in the cervical spaces, an extensive mediastinal empyema, a left pleural effusion and right hydropneumothorax
incision and drainage of the neck abscesses
purulent fluid in the cavity below was drained and packed
microscopy and culture of aspirated fluids and abscesses
growth of Streptococcus anginosus, Gemella morbillorum, and Staphylococcus lagdunensis
